Description: Deprecated as of 27/04/22, please use the Google Ads connector instead.
Name: Google AdWords

Methods.Name: Get Ad Performance
Methods.Description: The Ad Performance report includes all statistics aggregated at the ad level, one row per ad.

Methods.Name: Get Keywords Performance
Methods.Description: The Keywords Performance report includes all statistics aggregated at the keyword level, one row per keyword.

Methods.Name: Get Ad Group Performance
Methods.Description: The Ad Group Performance report includes all statistics aggregated by default at the ad group level, one row per ad group.

Methods.Name: Get Campaign Performance
Methods.Description: The Campaigns Performance report includes all statistics aggregated by default at the campaign level, one row per campaign.
